DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective study examine effect chronic antihypertensive medication vasopressor dose septic shock
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effect Chronic Antihypertensive Therapy Vasopressor Dosing Septic Shock
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective four-cohort study . The four cohort septic shock patient : 1 ) either chronic β-blocker chronic angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibitor ( ACE-Inhibitor ) , 2 ) chronic β-blocker , 3 ) ACE-Inhibitor , 4 ) chronic β-blocker ACE-inhibitor
DOC.criteria: Adult patient 18 year age old Diagnosis septic shock require vasopressor therapy ( norepinephrine , epinephrine , phenylephrine , dopamine , vasopressin ) Admitted intensive care unit ( ICU ) Rush University Medical Center ( RUMC ) Time frame : 01/01/2012 07/1/2016 Pregnant patient Transfer outside hospital vasopressor Admitted cardiopulmonary arrest Prior arrest within 24 hour admission RUMC
